attributes.action: Petition: To debate a vote of no confidence in this government.
attributes.background: This government represents only the banks and corporations. They hide the crimes of paedophiles, lie to the public over everything from the need for austerity to military action in Syria and do not represent the views of over 75% of the population. It is a morally bankrupt administration and must go

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
